file_content.text: We're close. Climb that tower and we find the Eternal Throne.
I swore to protect my people. I've failed them.
It was Vaylin and I who failed.
We can't change the past, but we can stop the fleet--and spare Zakuul more suffering.
That tower's our target. Climb to the peak and we reach the Eternal Throne.
First Ziost and Nathema... now Zakuul.
Everything Valkorion touches turns to ash.
Let's hope we can save this world from a similar fate.
Valkorion has poisoned your mind. Cleanse your corrupted memories, or you'll be trapped here forever.
Your mind is clear of Valkorion's corruption. Now find the holocron, and take back your body!
